alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:15AM CDT until April 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DE SOTO...SOUTHERN RED RIVER...WEST CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES AND NORTHERN SABINE PARISHES...NORTHEASTERN NACOGDOCHES...SHELBY...NORTHERN SAN AUGUSTINE AND NORTHWESTERN SABINE COUNTIES... At 1215 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Natchitoches to near Nacogdoches, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nacogdoches, Natchitoches, Center, Milam, Many, San Augustine, Zwolle, Converse, Melrose, Patroon, Martinsville, Bland Lake, Neuville, Woden, Shelbyville, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Provencal and Natchez. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
